options.content:
See Individual Tasks for $Organization See Science Data for $Organization

Globus Tasks by Organization
  • This dashboard shows top tasks with the specified organization as the source or destination.
  • Select an organization from the list above, or start typing the name of the specific organization since the dropdown menu will only show 1000 results at a time.
  • Click on the name of an institution in one of the tables to go to the individual tasks dashboard for that institution.
  • Globus Task endpoints are de-identified, and private data sources are marked "Private".
  • Private Task data rates and totals are available via the toggle at the top of this dashboard.
  • All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.src_resource_name:$resource AND meta.dst.community:$community AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw} ${internal:raw} AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

meta.src_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.src_resource_name:$resource AND meta.dst.community:$community AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw} ${internal:raw} AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)
meta.src_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.src_resource_name:$resource AND meta.dst.community:$community AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw} ${internal:raw}

meta.src_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.src_resource_name:$resource AND meta.dst.community:$community AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw} ${internal:raw} AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

meta.dst_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.dst_resource_name:$resource AND meta.src.community:$community AND meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} ${internal:raw} AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

meta.dst_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.dst_resource_name:$resource AND meta.src.community:$community AND meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} ${internal:raw} AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

meta.dst_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.dst_resource_name:$resource AND meta.src.community:$community AND meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} ${internal:raw} AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

meta.dst_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.dst_resource_name:$resource AND meta.src.community:$community AND meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} ${internal:raw} AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)

(meta.src_organization:$Organization OR meta.dst_organization:$Organization) AND ( meta.src_resource_name:$resource OR meta.dst_resource_name:$resource) AND (meta.src.community:$community OR meta.dst.community:$community) AND (meta.src_organization:${confidential:raw} AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw}) AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) ${internal:raw}

panels.title: Total Number of Tasks Distributed Over Selected Time Period

options.value: AND (!(meta.src_organization:"Texas Advanced Computing Center (TACC)" AND meta.dst_organization:"Texas Advanced Computing Center (TACC)"))

title: What are the top Globus tasks by organization?
